mean_en: a person who is one of the people who run a government or big company and who does everything according to the rules of that government or company :a person who is part of a bureaucracy
word_etyma: bureau局 + crat统治 → bureaucrat 官僚
sentence: The government bureaucrat approved all my papers.
sentence_trans: 政府官员（官僚主义者）批准了我所有的文章。
